channel.title: PIERRE DE LA CÔTE on iSight Pro
channel.description: Recent content in PIERRE DE LA CÔTE on iSight Pro

item.title: games with friends
item.description: I am a frequent gamer, and the iSight has been a life saver. Now I can play for long periods of time without even realizing I’m wearing a headset–they’re that light! The touch controls and eye capture, whereby I only need look and pinch, have been miraculous, too. I enjoy playing with my friends.
